html:
Brazil made headlines earlier this month with a record-setting showing at Lady Gaga‚Äôs concert at Copacabana Beach. But wait till you see footage from System of a Down‚Äôs gig in S√£o Paulo earlier this week: ‚ÄúThis is not a war zone, this is not a riot, this is a System of a Down style Rock & Roll concert in Brazil!!!!!!!‚Äù guitarist Daron Malakian proudly declared from the stage to an estimated crowd of 75,000 fans, some waving flares and fire spinners while others moshed with abandon. A drone captured the scene from above ‚Äî and it‚Äôs really something else (see below).

Get System of a Down Tickets Here

The concert came as part of System of a Down‚Äôs first visit to South America in a decade, so clearly the crowd was extra hyped. For North American fans, the band will be playing a series of special stadium shows in East Rutherford, NJ; Chicago; and Toronto this summer ‚Äî though something tells me flares won‚Äôt be as aplenty at these dates (blame the fire marshals). Regardless you can get tickets here.
